reviews.text: Had a great time! The food was delicious, the atmosphere was inviting, and the service was on point. Definitely going back!  The steak was cooked perfectly,  the rice was fresh and calamari was tasty!
Had my birthday dinner date here. Everything was fantastic, the food, the service, and the ambiance! Will definitely go again

From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted with warm hospitality and a cozy, upscale atmosphere that sets the tone for an exceptional dining experience. The food is absolutely phenomenal‚Äîevery dish is crafted with care, bursting with rich flavors and fresh ingredients. Whether it‚Äôs the pasta, seafood, or perfectly cooked meats, you can taste the passion in every bite. The service is top-notch: attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable without being overbearing. Gio has mastered the balance of fine dining and comfort. Easily one of the best dining experiences I‚Äôve had‚Äîhighly recommend to anyone who appreciates great food and great vibes.

I've been here twice already and I really like this place. The food is good, prices reasonable and the staff are great. The drinks are pretty good as well and the bar is great place too hang out at. Overall a great place to spend some quality time and eat and drink with friends in an outstanding atmosphere.

Just had a Baby Shower brunch for my daughter at GiO‚ÄôS. The food and service was excellent. I would highly recommend it for a party!
Kudos to the catering manager, Gina. She did a great job along with the catering staff.

recentReviews.text:
Just had a Baby Shower brunch for my daughter at GiO‚ÄôS. The food and service was excellent. I would highly recommend it for a party!
Kudos to the catering manager, Gina. She did a great job along with the catering staff.
Warm and friendly atmosphere and I always get the same thing, the Spicy Thai Chicken Noodles because it is delicious, although, I think a bit pricey.

From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted with warm hospitality and a cozy, upscale atmosphere that sets the tone for an exceptional dining experience. The food is absolutely phenomenal‚Äîevery dish is crafted with care, bursting with rich flavors and fresh ingredients. Whether it‚Äôs the pasta, seafood, or perfectly cooked meats, you can taste the passion in every bite. The service is top-notch: attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable without being overbearing. Gio has mastered the balance of fine dining and comfort. Easily one of the best dining experiences I‚Äôve had‚Äîhighly recommend to anyone who appreciates great food and great vibes.

Had a great time! The food was delicious, the atmosphere was inviting, and the service was on point. Definitely going back!  The steak was cooked perfectly,  the rice was fresh and calamari was tasty!
Delicious food and the owner and staff are very friendly and accommodating.

detailedReviews.author: Alexander Lepes
detailedReviews.text: Great peruvian food

detailedReviews.author: Debra DeForest
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food and friendly staff

detailedReviews.author: Patrick Murray
detailedReviews.text: Great food, great service!

detailedReviews.author: Alan Levy
detailedReviews.text:
Just had a Baby Shower brunch for my daughter at GiO‚ÄôS. The food and service was excellent. I would highly recommend it for a party!
Kudos to the catering manager, Gina. She did a great job along with the catering staff.

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Renteria
detailedReviews.text: Warm and friendly atmosphere and I always get the same thing, the Spicy Thai Chicken Noodles because it is delicious, although, I think a bit pricey.

detailedReviews.author: ROBERT LAMB
detailedReviews.text: From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre greeted with warm hospitality and a cozy, upscale atmosphere that sets the tone for an exceptional dining experience. The food is absolutely phenomenal‚Äîevery dish is crafted with care, bursting with rich flavors and fresh ingredients. Whether it‚Äôs the pasta, seafood, or perfectly cooked meats, you can taste the passion in every bite. The service is top-notch: attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable without being overbearing. Gio has mastered the balance of fine dining and comfort. Easily one of the best dining experiences I‚Äôve had‚Äîhighly recommend to anyone who appreciates great food and great vibes.

detailedReviews.author: Michael DeRosa
detailedReviews.text: Had a great time! The food was delicious, the atmosphere was inviting, and the service was on point. Definitely going back!  The steak was cooked perfectly,  the rice was fresh and calamari was tasty!

detailedReviews.author: Ana Vazquez
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food and the owner and staff are very friendly and accommodating.

detailedReviews.author: Lauren Campbell
detailedReviews.text: Had my birthday dinner date here. Everything was fantastic, the food, the service, and the ambiance! Will definitely go again

detailedReviews.author: Mamiche
detailedReviews.text: Chicken Alfredo was extremely bland, and beyond oily.

detailedReviews.author: Azelia Ng
detailedReviews.text: Food was good but the waitress during a slow brunch was not paying any attention but on her phone the whole time. I had to call the bus boy to get her attention or else walk up to her myself

detailedReviews.author: Matt Florence
detailedReviews.text: First time here since they opened. The Peruvian rice dish is fantastic. The fact that it's made with a hot dog caught my eye and it actually adds to the dish. Wife had the salmon and she liked as well. Service was good. I'll be back

detailedReviews.author: Al G
detailedReviews.text: I've been here twice already and I really like this place. The food is good, prices reasonable and the staff are great. The drinks are pretty good as well and the bar is great place too hang out at. Overall a great place to spend some quality time and eat and drink with friends in an outstanding atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: Vesna Kanacki
detailedReviews.text: My very own neighborhood "Cheers".  A place where everyone knows your name.  The owner Gio, could not be nicer and accommodating, along with Joe, the bartender and Gina the event coordinator.  It's one of my frequent places to go!  Their happy hour menu is very generous.

detailedReviews.author: K A
detailedReviews.text: Just had dinner here tonight with my family and wow we have been missing out on this gem. Delicious food and great service. This is going to become our new go to for family dinners happy hours etc. Loved it!

detailedReviews.author: David Finley
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely delicious, cannot wait to go back!

detailedReviews.author: L MD
detailedReviews.text: Came here for the first time, and I didn't have a great experience. Upon walking in, there was no hostess. We waited there for a few minutes & then she finally came out from the kitchen.  It took a very long time before anyone came to our table to serve us. When we finally ordered our drinks, it took over 20 minutes before we got our drinks. This is also not a very big restaurant, and it wasn't very busy, so there's no reason for the long waits. Our waitress wasn't very attentive, nor was she very friendly.  The food took a very long time to come out. I was disappointed with my meal, and I did not like it at all, so I did not eat it. My son ordered a chicken sandwich and the cut of chicken was so thick, and unpleasant. He did not like his meal either. No one at our party said that their meal was very good. $250 later, no one was happy with their meal, service was slow and we had a not so cordial waitress.  I don't see the hype in some of these reviews. I've had so many good meals from other local restaurants, such as Blu Fig for half the price.  Bellissimo in Montvale has amazing food, good service and a great atmosphere, and our bill has never come up that high.  I had high hopes for Gio's, but after the bad experience with the poor service, from the moment of walking in, unusually long waits for everything, and the low quality food, I unfortunately will not be returning. I am one that will become a regular if the food and service are good, but this place will not be added to my list of restaurants that I frequent. I honestly wish I would've just sent my meal and my son's meal back to the kitchen, instead of paying for it and staying hungry.  There were 2 restaurants before Gio's, and none of them lasted very long. I can't see them lasting very long. I was so disappointed, and wasted so much money and was still hungry at the end of the night.  I hope management learns something from this review. As an entrepreneur, reviews are paramount because it gives you a real view of what's really going on in areas where you might've miss, and it highlights the areas where improvements are needed.

detailedReviews.author: Kim Taylor
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic food, great weeknight and seasonal.  Service is great and the staff makes terrific recommendations. Also, fo for the weekend brunch!.

detailedReviews.author: Timothy Finley
detailedReviews.text:
I don't get it. Why is there not a huge line out the front door.
The food was on point. The drinks were on point. The waitress was amazing. Even the bus boy was amazing. Everyone we interacted with went above and beyond. My wife has some unique allergies, and they bent over backwards to help. Every aspect of this visit was top notch. I normally don't give reviews. I think I have less than a handful, but this place was so good I had to say something. I'm sure in the future, I'm probably going to be the one that complains about the long lines whenever we go.
But, this place is worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Shawn Varughese
detailedReviews.text: Great service !

detailedReviews.author: Oscar Velz
detailedReviews.text: Ok, first of all we were in the search for a place to make 20 pp party and went many places and everyone was so limited in options, others just slammed the doors on us like "River palm in Wahwah, not recommended" but Then we found GIO'S, and it was the best decision we made, Starting with Gilberto and the banquet manager both where so helpful and have millions of ideas and answers to our questions, they showed to have no limits, gave us plenty of choices to choose from, we accidentally smash part of our cake and my wife almost cry, then the banquet manager lady jump in action and said " don't worry, we can fix it and make it beautiful again" we appreciate her kindness very much, lovely dining room, extra room by the well setting bar area, and a dedicated banquet room upstairs that sits about 100pp, man I can keep going on and on but have to stop at some time, haha, this place is 10 stars, highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Laura O'Brien
detailedReviews.text: Best Spagetti Carbonara I‚Äôve ever eaten. Kudos to the chef. Very pleasant waitress, nice atmosphere. Will be back.

detailedReviews.author: J Kaye
detailedReviews.text: Just okay.  Very empty..yet the kitchen took 25+ minutes to plate food. Uggh

detailedReviews.author: Shai Crook
detailedReviews.text: We recently celebrated a special event at Gio's, and it exceeded our expectations in every way! The staff went above and beyond to accommodate our needs, the food was absolutely delicious, and the venue was beautifully set up. We were thoroughly impressed and had a fantastic time. I would highly recommend Gio's for any occasion and look forward to returning in the future!

detailedReviews.author: allison matthews
detailedReviews.text: Gio's is the best! The best atmosphere friendly warm very friendly staff. Great food at a great place. Danny makes the best cocktail.

detailedReviews.author: Paul Kilduff
detailedReviews.text: I've only been here once, but it was great. Very good food and service at a reasonable price.

detailedReviews.author: Danielle Domen
detailedReviews.text: We had a party there this past weekend. Everything was wonderful. From the banquetanager Gina, to the wait staff  to the hostess,  everyone was so lovely. The room we were in was lovely. The food was delicious.  I highly recommend them!

detailedReviews.author: Jose Mejia
detailedReviews.text: Great food, Great service. Gio is the best, the food is great. Specially the Lamb Chops

detailedReviews.author: Tracy Marcoux
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food and excellent service, will definitely be returning often.  Welcome to the neighborhood!

detailedReviews.author: Ionel Porumb
detailedReviews.text: Great local restaurant, I stoped for a quick bite. Service was great, their wings were fabulous

detailedReviews.author: Susan Marcoux
detailedReviews.text: WOW!  Gio's hosted my daughter's bridal shower today.  IT was phenomenal.   The food, atmosphere, service, etc.  Special shout out to Gio, Gina, Danni and everyone else who made our party pure perfection. I wish I had another celebratory occasion coming up to use them again.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Mennell
detailedReviews.text: Love Gio's! Great selection on the menu, incredible flavors and good prices, and such a fun and amazing staff! Will definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Ren Dan
detailedReviews.text: Hosted my baby shower at the location. Amazing service and the team was wonderful. Solid food. The upstairs and downstairs space is great for events. Definitely solid.

detailedReviews.author: Rosario Aguilar
detailedReviews.text: We‚Äôve been here a few times after work, there‚Äôs not many places in Rockland County that make drinks this well. Joe is amazing!!

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Nunez
detailedReviews.text: Friendly service and awesome atmosphere next to the fireplace. I loved the food so I am going back. Top notch pisco sour!

detailedReviews.author: Augie Gemignani
detailedReviews.text:
Joe and staff do an amazing job. Very friendly and fun to be with. Very cool place to go for a few cocktails.
Definitely going back...

detailedReviews.author: David Marlow
detailedReviews.text:
Came here on a Monday night. My daughter did 'make your own pizza' - the guy helping her was very friendly and patient. Kids get to make a personal sized pizza (they roll out the dough, put sauce, cheese, and any toppings).

I got the ribs with loaded mashed potatoes and their version of a Moscow Mule. All good stuff and fairly generous portion. Food was great and so was service.

detailedReviews.author: Logicdiary317
detailedReviews.text: Smells the same as it did 10 years ago under old management and name. To me that means they use not only the same ovens but they also don't clean them. How else would it smell the same with a whole new menu?! Wild!

detailedReviews.author: Graham Parker
detailedReviews.text: Loved this place. Have driven by a bunch and never stopped, but tonight was the night. We were all starving and our server was delightful, full of information and made excellent recommendations.

detailedReviews.author: James Thomas
detailedReviews.text: What a great place to spend my new year's eve. Great food great atmosphere..

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Kryger
detailedReviews.text: Have been here several times with large groups and always great service and food. Definitely recommend for memorable family get together.

detailedReviews.author: Gianni DD
detailedReviews.text: Nice place. Ate here 2x. Food is good.  Service is attentive.  Next time we go we will try the casual bar area.

detailedReviews.author: karen hagman
detailedReviews.text: Joe bartend is great üëç

detailedReviews.author: Tinu Thomas
detailedReviews.text: One of my Go to spot for sports. Joe the bartender is phenomenal. Always have specials for game time and the food is amazing! Keep up the great work fellas

detailedReviews.author: linda keshishian
detailedReviews.text: Our waiter was knowledgeable accommodating and friendly. The food was delish and the atmosphere wonderful. Overall a really nice experience would definitely return!

detailedReviews.author: Steve Howard
detailedReviews.text: Went for dinner for my daughter in law‚Äôs birthday. 3 of us had the prime rib special and she had the shrimp and pasta. If not for the special I would have a hard time choosing from the menu. Service was amazing as was the food. Really cozy atmosphere. I cannot wait to go back there.

detailedReviews.author: lissette colon
detailedReviews.text: Amazing Expresso Martini's made by Joe! The service and food was amazing! Great atmosphere too.

detailedReviews.author: Kenneth M. Borden
detailedReviews.text: Gio's is a nice place. Food was good. Service was good. Everything went well.

detailedReviews.author: Stephen Bradley
detailedReviews.text: The food was fantastic. We came on a Thursday evening with our 11 month old son, and not only did we enjoy our food, but so did he. The atmosphere was fun, the bathrooms were very nice, the menu has great variety, and the bar had a great selection. What made me want to write this review was because of how attentive and genuinely nice our waiter Elder was. Thank you for a wonderful night out with a baby, which is hard to do in most situations.

detailedReviews.author: Richard
detailedReviews.text:
Excellent place for any type of banquet.  Professional staff. Delicious food. Reasonable
pricing.

detailedReviews.author: Arl P
detailedReviews.text: I was not impressed with this restaurant. Hubby and I went here on 6/21/23. He got the parma Romano and I got the margarita pizza and our app was mozzarella sticks. Bill was approx $65. The place was very dark, not like the picture at all. Daniella, our server was pleasant and answered our questions. I did not enjoy my dinner and I don‚Äôt plan on going back

detailedReviews.author: pomonadora
detailedReviews.text: Came with friends to celebrate Father's Day. The service was excellent, the food was very good, big portions which included sides and salad. I had the branzino, and it was delicious. Our friends enjoyed their dinner too. I highly recommend this place. It was our first time here, and we will be back.

detailedReviews.author: Igor Derkach
detailedReviews.text: Pricely but it worth it

detailedReviews.author: Laly Campos
detailedReviews.text: Food was delicious and fresh! My girls loved it here, will be returning

detailedReviews.author: Donna Hartman
detailedReviews.text: Mother's day. Very disappointed for 2nd time, thought I'd give another chance. I feel they could get their act together for buffets. Never again...

detailedReviews.author: Harrison Gerson
detailedReviews.text: Great service, large portions, would come again, the food was a bit bland but still tasty!

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Hefner
detailedReviews.text: We had the nachos with steak..Great...the dinner was also good. We have the steak tacos and the chicken sandwich...one little but I ask for no avocado, which unfortunately they did not take out...the drinks were great..our waitress was awesome, our waitress Emma M. Was great...

detailedReviews.author: Life is short
detailedReviews.text:
Super fun place to eat and drink
Make sure to try the pizza

detailedReviews.author: Lindsey Mascia
detailedReviews.text: Went to Gios for a fundraiser/moms night out! Sat at the bar and the service was wonderful. The bar tender was super attentive, drinks were delicious. I ordered a salad and it was very fresh and yummy! Had the perfect amount of salad dressing. The entire staff was very warm and welcoming. The atmosphere was peaceful and comfortable. Highly recommend for your next gathering or even just a date night!!

detailedReviews.author: URGENT CARE
detailedReviews.text: Had a really great meal here. Exceptional service!!

detailedReviews.author: Diya Luke
detailedReviews.text: I was part of a private party here in the upstairs space. We arrived early to help decorate for our event, and the hosts were absolutely wonderful to work with. They wanted to make sure we had a great time and felt comfortable in the space. It was almost like setting up with friends. This was the easiest private event to set up because of their hospitality and accommodations. The food was also great!

detailedReviews.author: Marcella D'Aston
detailedReviews.text: This packed dinner spot really made for a fantastic night! Delicious food, lovely atmosphere by the fire, and tasty cocktails.

detailedReviews.author: Deja
detailedReviews.text: Beware of this restaurant, the food is FAR from fresh. I ordered wings and I have never tasted wings that tasted so old and terrible from a restaurant. I do not know what they are thinking to serve old poultry like that and I just pray that we don‚Äôt fall ill from these. They need a health inspection ASAP

detailedReviews.author: Louise Mendez
detailedReviews.text: Love, love,  loved it! Amazing food,  sooo many choices! Excellent staff.  First time I came it was our second choice our first choice had a long wait tme, thank you - i have been back almost weekly and will continue to do so üëå

detailedReviews.author: Nancy Marji
detailedReviews.text: We enjoyed dinner for my husband's birthday on a saturday. The resturaunt is quiet, service is impressive and quick. Our waitress was wonderful, as soon as we sat down we were greeted, asked for drinks, and soon after appetizers and our entrees. We didn't wait long in between meals. As far as food goes, I got the bronzino filet which was grilled, healthy, light in oil. My husband got chicken parm and pasta and that was cooked well. Highly reccomend the blackened salmon.

detailedReviews.author: David Bulnes
detailedReviews.text: Attentive staff provides a quality dining experience with a diverse menu that is sure to please a variety of palates.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.5/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the exceptional food quality, noting dishes are crafted with care and bursting with rich flavors and fresh ingredients. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The warm and friendly atmosphere, combined with attentive and knowledgeable service, creates an inviting dining experience that customers love. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

The restaurant is highly recommended for special events and gatherings, with excellent service and a cozy, upscale ambiance that sets the tone for memorable occasions. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and inattentive service - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area

neutral.author: Azelia Ng
neutral.text: Food was good but the waitress during a slow brunch was not paying any attention but on her phone the whole time. I had to call the bus boy to get her attention or else walk up to her myself

neutral.author: J Kaye
neutral.text: Just okay.  Very empty..yet the kitchen took 25+ minutes to plate food. Uggh

negative.author: Mamiche
negative.text: Chicken Alfredo was extremely bland, and beyond oily.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
